decolorization result: High oxidation rates with electron-donating substituents
any additional information: Examined using horseradish peroxidase, manganese peroxidase, lignin peroxidase.
All tested dyes were poor substrates.
Oxidation and generation of sulfanilic acid confirmed.
In the presence of potassium nitrate, 49% increase in oxidation observed.
Decolorization rates proportional to mixing rates.
